game_description: Take the wheel and experience the rush of high-speed VR racing like no other. With precision virtual steering, you'll feel the power as you conquer every curve and straightaway. This isn't just a game - it's a virtual driving experience that will leave you breathless. Buckle up and get ready to shift into high gear, leaving your competition in the dust. With jaw-dropping graphics and immersive VR technology, this game will blow your mind. Step into the driver's seat, grab the steering and start racing.
review_1: this game might help me drive in the future. can you make it so your hands snap onto the steering wheel because it helps to not get confused when I quickly look down at the wheel and maybe add some automatic cars
review_2: Please get automatic cars and the ability to use the triggers as the gas and brake
review_3: I love the game and I like how much you can turn the wheel but I don’t know how to unlock other maps and cars. I don’t know if I’m supposed to buy them or what
